item.title: 【英语随笔】How to Make Time for Language Learning with a Full-Time Job
item.author: Kendrick
item.description: 引用 以下内容来源于: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sqxYGubJTc 🍒 原文内容 If you have big dreams   for learning a new language but have   very limited time for studying and often find   that your job or busy schedule   gets in the way of achieving those dreams then this is the video for you. Learning a new language   takes constant time and
